member.summary: Gets the associated with the connection, if there is one.
member.param: The representing the connection.
member.returns: The associated with the connection, or if the connection is not HTTP-based.

member.summary: Gets or sets a bitmask combining one or more values that specify what transports the server should use to receive HTTP requests.

member.summary: Gets the used by the web sockets transport.

member.summary: Gets the used by the long polling transport.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions.TransportMaxBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum buffer size for data read by the application before backpressure is applied.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions.ApplicationMaxBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum buffer size for data written by the application before backpressure is applied.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions.MinimumProtocolVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum protocol verison supported by the server. The default value is 0, the lowest possible protocol version.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions.TransportSendTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time the transport will wait for a send to complete. If a single send exceeds this timeout the connection is closed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions.CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration
member.summary: Authenticated connections whose token sets the value will be closed and allowed to reconnect when the token expires.
member.remarks: Closed connections will miss messages sent while closed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Connections.WebSocketOptions.SubProtocolSelector
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate that will be called when a new WebSocket is established to select the value for the 'Sec-WebSocket-Protocol' response header. The delegate will be called with a list of the protocols provided by the client in the 'Sec-WebSocket-Protocol' request header.
member.remarks: See RFC 6455 section 1.3 for more details on the WebSocket handshake: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6455#section-1.3

The position in at which decoding should begin.
The number of characters in to decode.

member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded into a byte[].
member.param: A string containing the base64url-encoded input to decode.
The position in at which decoding should begin.
Scratch buffer to hold the s to decode. Array must be large enough to hold and characters as well as Base64 padding characters. Content is not preserved.
The offset into at which to begin writing the s to decode.
The number of characters in to decode.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws if the input is malformed.

The offset into at which to begin encoding.
Buffer to receive the base64url-encoded form of . Array must be large enough to hold characters and the full base64-encoded form of , including padding characters.
